def_cn: （游戏或彩票的）头奖，最高奖；（尤指游戏中的）累积赌注金
def_en: A jackpot is the most valuable prize in a game or lottery, especially when the game involves increasing the value of the prize until someone wins it.

def_cn: 取得巨大成功；赢了一大笔钱；交好运
def_en: If you hit the jackpot, you have a great success, for example by winning a lot of money or having a piece of good luck.
